Primary Contact: Jacquie Thom, Program Coordinator, Vision Mates, Ambassadors; Phone: 250.763.1191 ext 6178; Email: jacquie.thom@cnib.ca
Service Details: - Provides programs and services, low vision assessments, independent living skills (offers fully functional independent living skills kitchen), mobility training, adaptive technology, consumer products, research, peer support and one of the world's largest libraries for people with print disabilities- Advocates and focuses on eye protection and prevention of vision loss as well as on future treatments and cures
Eligibility: Individuals with a visual impairment which cannot be corrected by ordinary lenses
Address & Map: 1456 St. Paul St, #101Kelowna, BC     V1Y 2E6View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: St Paul St and Bernard Ave
Former Name: Canadian National Institute for the Blind
